blog.name: ilms-art
blog.title: a student of all arts
blog.description:
Hi there! 
Ask, reblog, like or just ignore me, I can't stop you😊 you can aslo follow me on instagram @ ilm1989 😊
I've been studying 3D for a couple of years now, but I'm only in my second semester of my first year in school. I'm studying 3D Design and Animation this year and Game Development next year. But I see myself as more of a potato artist, I like everything! And because of a school assignment I'm hooked to drawing lately. I want to share what I do and let people comment on my development as I try to better myself as an artist in every way I can think of. Please leave me your thoughts on my work, and feel free to ignore the occasional picture of my cat, allthough he'd love the attention too... 😂❤😄

summary: Noldus, my little big guy 😍 my fluffy hairball of cuddles 😘 doesn't he just have this kitten-ish look on his face? I swear he'll...
body:
Noldus, my little big guy 😍 my fluffy hairball of cuddles 😘 doesn’t he just have this kitten-ish look on his face? I swear he’ll never grow up.

Funny story, his name comes from Dobby the Elf in Harry Potter, in the norwegian books ALL of the characters names is dubbed into their own funny versions of the original names. Dobby is Noldus in the norwegian version. (Harrys name is obviously still the same, but Hermoine Granger is Hermine Grang and Dumbledore is Humlesnurr..)

Anyway.. that’s only funny if you’re a fan of Harry Potter 😅 sorry to the rest of ya’ll 😅

Anyway.. that’s only funny if you’re a fan of Harry Potter 😅 sorry to the rest of ya’ll 😅

title: Что может быть хуже свадьбы?
body:

by soul_of_spring

Свадьба лучшего друга вполне может быть подобна концу света. А еще она может принести внезапные сюрпризы.
Работа выполнена по заявке: Сириус/фем!Снейп.
Сириус и Снейп на свадьбе Джеймса и Лили шафер и подружка невесты. Первая встреча с окончания школы.

summary:
*after Draco helps him with his homework*
Harry: Thanks so much!!! You're the best! Can I marry you?
Draco: Finally! Yes!! I...
body:
*after Draco helps him with his homework*
Harry: Thanks so much!!! You're the best! Can I marry you?
Draco: Finally! Yes!! I have all the wedding plans here!
Harry:... it was a joke
Draco: Yeah, of course,  mine too *pushes the "Wedding Notebook" into his bag again*

dialogue.phrase: *after Draco helps him with his homework*

dialogue.name: Harry
dialogue.label: Harry:
dialogue.phrase: Thanks so much!!! You're the best! Can I marry you?

dialogue.name: Draco
dialogue.label: Draco:
dialogue.phrase: Finally! Yes!! I have all the wedding plans here!

dialogue.label: Draco:
dialogue.phrase: Yeah, of course,  mine too *pushes the "Wedding Notebook" into his bag again*

blog.description: Greetings babes. I’m Anastasia. I have a special place in my heart for both Shakespeare and Harry Potter. Icon by @risuniku. If you need something tagged that I don't already tag let me know and I will do so.

summary: Haben Dumbledore und Grindelwald eine homosexuelle Beziehung? Fans ärgern sich über J.K. Rowling
title: Haben Dumbledore und Grindelwald eine homosexuelle Beziehung? Fans ärgern sich über J.K. Rowling
body:
Harry-Potter-Fans ärgern sich über J.K. Rowling: In einem Interview sprach die Autorin davon, dass zwei der männlichen Charaktere eine homosexuelle Liebesbeziehung miteinander hätten.

Konkret geht es dabei um die beiden Charaktere Dumbledore (der Schulleiter der Hogwarts-Schule) und Grindelwald (ein schwarzer Magier) aus dem Harry-Potter-Universum. Im Rahmes des DVD-Bonusmaterials des Films “Phantastische Tierwesen: Grindelwalds Verbrechen” erklärt Rowling in einem Interview: “Ihre Beziehung war unglaublich intensiv. Sie war leidenschaftlich und sie war eine Liebesaffäre. Aber wie das in jeder Beziehung passiert, ob gay, straight oder welche Schubladen wir dem auch immer geben wollen, weiß keiner, was die andere Person wirklich fühlt”, zitiert sie die Website “mashable.com”.

“Also ich bin weniger an der sexuellen Seite interessiert – obwohl ich glaube, dass diese Beziehung eine sexuelle Dimension hat – als viel mehr an den Emotionen, die sie füreinander empfinden. Genau das ist schlussendlich das Faszinierendste an menschlichen Beziehungen”, fuhr Rowling fort.

Genervte Fan-Reaktionen

Nicht alle fanden Rowlings Gedanken zu dem Thema angemessen. Eine Twitter-Nutzerin kritisierte beispielsweise, Rowling wolle das Harry-Potter-Universum nachträglich diversifizieren.

I have the exact same reaction to JK Rowling trying to retroactively diversify the Harry Potter universe as I do to James Cameron promising four Avatar sequels. Nobody asked for this.

— Hazel Hayes (@TheHazelHayes) March 18, 2019

“Ich habe genau dieselbe Reaktion auf J.K. Rowling, die nachträglich das Harry-Potter-Universum diversifizieren will, die ich auch auf James Cameron hatte, als der vier Avatar-Fortsetzungen ankündigte. Danach hat niemand gefragt.”

Ein anderer kritisierte, Rowling habe mit ihrem Diskurs homosexuelle Charaktere und Beziehungen rein auf Sex reduziert.

Like, way to miss the point and undermine everything you COULD have done to rectify the mistake of leaving Dumbledore’s orientation out of canon. This further reduces queer relationships and queer characters just to sex in media commentary. Which is the last thing we needed.

— Exorcising Emily (@exorcisingemily) March 17, 2019

“Den Punkt so richtig verfehlt und wirklich alles untergraben, was du tun hättest können, um zu beheben, dass du Dumbledores sexuelle Orientierung im Kanon außen vor gelassen hast. Das reduziert schwule Beziehungen und Charaktere auf reinen Sex in den Medienkommentaren. Und das ist das Letzte, was wir gebraucht haben.”

Noch kritischer sieht dieser Nutzer das Bild, das Rowling von Homosexualität zeichnet.

JK Rowling reveals her inability to see gays as anything but vile and awful monsters.

— Veikko Elo (@TotosAfricaVevo) March 18, 2019

“J.K. Rowling zeigt ihre Unfähigkeit, Homosexuelle als etwas anderes als eklige und fürchterliche Monster zu sehen.”

Eine Nutzerin erklärt, dass Rowling generell gerne unnötige Details anfüge.

jk rowling reappearing every 2 months to say something literally no one asked about is me adding more random details to my essay to up my word count https://t.co/70D37Xez76

— 𝓈𝒶𝓎𝓃𝒶 (@DAREDEVllLS) March 17, 2019

“J.K. Rowling, die alle zwei Monate auftaucht, um etwas zu sagen, nach dem niemand gefragt hat, ist so wie ich, wenn ich bei Essays irgendwelche Details hinzufüge, nur um auf eine größere Anzahl an Wörtern zu kommen.”

Die Frage nach der Sexualität der Charaktere stelle sich doch gar nicht, findet eine andere Person.

What did Dumbledore’s sexual orientation have to do with the storyline at all

— SIR E.U (@SIREUTHEGR8) March 17, 2019

“Was hat Dumbledores sexuelle Orientierung bitte mit der Geschichte zu tun?”

Die Kritik an Rowling hat also mehrere Facetten: Während einige LGBT-Befürworter argumentieren, Rowling hätte die Sexualität von vornherein nicht außen vorlassen dürfen oder hätte einen völlig missglückten Diskurs losgetreten, finden andere, dass sich die Autorin an die LGBT-Bewegung anbiedern wolle. Wiederum andere scheinen die Ausführungen generell für unnötig zu halten.

Rowling wollte die Kontroverse auf Anfrage des Nachrichtensenders CNN nicht kommentieren, wie eine Sprecherin mitteilte.

— 𝓈𝒶𝓎𝓃𝒶 (@DAREDEVllLS) March 17, 2019

“J.K. Rowling, die alle zwei Monate auftaucht, um etwas zu sagen, nach dem niemand gefragt hat, ist so wie ich, wenn ich bei Essays irgendwelche Details hinzufüge, nur um auf eine größere Anzahl an Wörtern zu kommen.”

Die Frage nach der Sexualität der Charaktere stelle sich doch gar nicht, findet eine andere Person.

What did Dumbledore’s sexual orientation have to do with the storyline at all

— SIR E.U (@SIREUTHEGR8) March 17, 2019

“Was hat Dumbledores sexuelle Orientierung bitte mit der Geschichte zu tun?”

Die Kritik an Rowling hat also mehrere Facetten: Während einige LGBT-Befürworter argumentieren, Rowling hätte die Sexualität von vornherein nicht außen vorlassen dürfen oder hätte einen völlig missglückten Diskurs losgetreten, finden andere, dass sich die Autorin an die LGBT-Bewegung anbiedern wolle. Wiederum andere scheinen die Ausführungen generell für unnötig zu halten.

Rowling wollte die Kontroverse auf Anfrage des Nachrichtensenders CNN nicht kommentieren, wie eine Sprecherin mitteilte.

summary:
Think of the most kind, thoughtful, helpful, accepting, hard-working
person you know. Isn’t that person amazing? All these words...
body:
Think of the most kind, thoughtful, helpful, accepting, hard-working person you know. Isn’t that person amazing? All these words describe the most wonderful lady I know. One of the most underrated, and yet she’s one of the best things to ever happen to our part of the world. She’s amazing. She doesn’t judge; she’s famous for taking in the “leftovers”, the people who don’t necessarily fit into any category, not that they would need to. Her life is dedicated to helping people, to educating everyone, not just the smart, the brave, the ambitious. She values no one above anyone else. Rumour has it she left a secret room in the castle, a room that is devoted to help people in their greatest moment of need, just like she is. She, her descendants and her followers all add a little bit of sunshine into what could otherwise be a dark gloomy day. She is so utterly wonderful.

Her name is Helga. Helga Hufflepuff. 

happy hufflepuff pride guys!! i know i’m a little late but i fricking love everything about hufflepuff with my whole heart, so i had to write something. enjoy xxx

summary: Phoebe Jean-Baptiste, Ravenclaw, granddaughter of Marie Laveau, a renowed New Orleans Voodoo queen. As a young girl, she moved...
body: Phoebe Jean-Baptiste, Ravenclaw, granddaughter of Marie Laveau, a renowed New Orleans Voodoo queen. As a young girl, she moved with her family from Haiti to New Orleans, where her grandmother took it upon herself to mentor Phoebe in the art of Voodoo. Denounced by the wizarding community, described as ‘evil’ and only read about if you can manage to find yourself in the restricted section of the library at Hogwarts, Voodoo is a sacred practice that is mostly hidden by the witches and wizards who perform it. Voodoo is notably condemned by Seraphina Picquery, former president of MACUSA, which therefore made it difficult for Phoebe and her family to carry on their practices in America. They moved to England when Phoebe received her letter for Ilvermorny at the age of 11. Marie Laveau claimed, “Ilvermorny teaches you to bottle up your magic, Hogwarts teaches you to embrace it.” As Phoebe advances into her fourth year of Hogwarts, her family must face a pressing concern regarding the MACUSA. Will they be able to make it out safely?

summary: So I’m applying to go to University in July...
title: So I’m applying to go to University in July...
body:
Me, writing a Personal Competencies Statement: How do I say, ‘I write gay wizard porn in my spare time’ but in an academic kind of way?

Like this,

'I am a prolific writer of relationship based fictional fantasy stories which I publish periodically in an online community of like-minded authors.’

blog.name: the-cursed-vaults-kid
blog.title: Don’t Have Energy For These Hoes

•Indie Jacob’s Sibling Blog

•May be multi-muse

•OC account

•Mun is 18+

•I’m the laziest person around but I will fite you

•Mun draws

summary:
Jacob Kendall Roseveil
——
Reasons for why I picked these characters for him:
•Dipper Pines (Gravity Falls)
Jacob sacrificed a...
body:
Your Jacob’s character

Jacob Kendall Roseveil

——

Reasons for why I picked these characters for him:

•Dipper Pines (Gravity Falls)

Jacob sacrificed a lot as his role as the older sibling and sometimes he didn’t even want to do so much for his younger sister, but he did it anyway. He loves her dearly, but he sometimes wished he could distance himself from her because of all the anxiety he had with the Cursed Vaults and finding them and sacrificing a lot to protect her. He did exactly that and grew distant as the years passed which confused his sibling and angered her.

•Elsa (Frozen)

Again as said before, he distanced himself over the years due to his fear of putting her in danger and annoyance at the fact that he had to give up so much for her. It was this ongoing back and forth with him, but he grew to be selfish with the things he wanted and let in the dark.

•Levi Ackerman (Attack on Titan)

On the exterior, Jacob was cold and looked unhappy to a lot of people, he always replied in a monotone voice and people always wondered why he was like that. He wasn’t that social and was quite the antisocial one, he would rather spend the afternoon cooped up in his room reading or figuring out where to find the next Cursed Vault. Of course, to his few friends he acted different and treated them with more care and especially his best friend Duncan Ashe. He treated him like family.

•Connor Murphy (Dear Evan Hansen the Musical)

The relationship between Jacob and his sister was a rough one, at times he was kind and other times he was cold and distant. He would even snap at her and never apologize for it, but at this point he snapped at a lot of people for no reason. He constant went through paranoia and emotional pain while everyone was blind to it because he was so good at hiding how bad it all was and how unhappy he was. When he disappeared and left no trace, his sister was angry at him despite the fact she cared so much about him. On the outside, she was bitter about how he left her all alone with no older sibling to go to Hogwarts with. No older sibling that could protect her. But she still tried to find him and she eventually found herself actually grieving and she didn’t think she would.

•Kylo Ren/Ben Solo (Star Wars)

Jacob was being manipulated by R while no one else knew and he slipped into this darkness which he was all too familiar with. He did things that he wasn’t proud of and even for the greater good and he definitely brought shame to Slytherin house. But he was hurt inside and he needed someone, he needed someone to relate to his anxieties and situation. Although there was so many friends to reach out to, he didn’t ever reach out to any of them because he felt they could never understand or help. They would call him a monster and he believed he was one. They’d be mad at him and judge him for being so dead set on finding these Cursed Vaults that everyone was skeptical about.

Tagging:

@the-plump-chancellor
